edge: range(from, to).description: Edge: Returns an array of numbers within a given range

edge: batch(array).description: Edge: Convert an array to a batch of nested arrays.

edge: toJSON(object).description: Edge: Convert an object to a JSON string via JSON.stringify.

edge: first(array).description: Edge: Returns the first item from an array.

edge: last(array).description: Edge: Returns the last item from an array.

edge: groupBy(array).description: Edge: Group an array via given field. For example group all articles for an author.

edge: size(array).description: Edge: Return size of a string or an array.

edge: el(...).description: Edge: Returns an HTML string by replacing dynamic placeholders with actual content. It is helpful inside if shorthand.

edge: upperFirst(text).description: Edge: Convert first character of a string to uppercase.

edge: lowerFirst(text).description: Edge: Convert first character of a string to lowercase.

edge: capitalize(text).description: Edge: Convert first character of all words inside a string to uppercase.

edge: truncate (text1, limit, ...).description: Edge: Truncate a string to a given limit

edge: toAnchor(url, title = url).description: Edge: Convert a url to an anchor tag

edge: urlEncode(string).description: Edge: Encode a string to be url safe.
